original_text: Then Absalom said to his servants, ‘Joab has a field that is next to mine. Some barley is growing in it. Go and light a fire there, so that it all burns.’ So Absalom's servants went to Joab's field and they did that.
korean_text: 압살롬이 자기의 종들에게 이르되 보라 요압의 밭이 내 밭 근처에 있고 거기 보리가 있으니 가서 불을 지르라 하니라 압살롬의 종들이 그 밭에 불을 질렀더니

sentences.original_text: Then Absalom said to his servants
Joab has a field that is next to mine
sentences.korean_translation: 요아에게 나의 땅 옆에 있는 밭이 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Some barley is growing in it
Go and light a fire there
So Absalom's servants went to Joab's field
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 압솔롬의 종들이 요아의 밭으로 갔습니다
